attributes.additional_details: Most people need to get to areas quick in an E scooter. Just because people don’t put in physical input to use an e scooter should not stop people to not ride an E scooter
attributes.background: I would like to make E scooters on Pavements legal for age 12 onwards

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. E-scooters are already legal and are being trialled in various places of the UK.

You could start a new petition calling on the Government to change the guidance on the use of e-scooters, to allow users to ride on pavements, if this is something you would like to see happen.
